items.title: Bluetti launches Alternator & Solar dual DC Charger 2 + bundles from CES 2026 with up to 48% exclusive savings from $332

Coinciding and launching from CES 2026, Bluetti is now offering its brand new on-the-go charging solution alongside several bundle options and even exclusive savings for our readers. Things kick-off with the standalone Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 at $331.55 shipped, after using the exclusive code ELECTREK5OFF at checkout for an additional 5% savings. This all-new unit will fetch $599 after these initial discounts settle, with this not only being the first chance to save, but using our code scores you $17 more savings than you’d normally get. All-in-all, you’re looking at a combined $267 markdown that sets the bar for future discounts throughout the New Year – and don’t forget all the additional bundle options to also score power stations, solar panels, and more with it, which you can find below.

Of course, if you only need the power station, you can get that standalone unit down at $1,099 shipped right now.

items.summary:
The official roborock Amazon storefront is offering its Qrevo 35A Robot Vacuum and Mop at $429.99 shipped. Normally priced at $650 without any savings, the previous holiday season saw costs go as low as $350 during Black Friday before rising back to its full rate for the first half of December and spending the second half at $450. Now, 2026 is giving us the first discount of the New Year with $220 cut from the full price, landing it at the third-best rate we have tracked – beaten out by the $400 and $350 rates we saw during November.
